title: winsley_stats19
text:
library(tmap)

cost_all_osm <- readRDS("data/osm_link_cost.RDS")

tmap_mode("view")

ℹ tmap mode set to "view".

tm_shape(cost_all_osm) +
  tm_lines(col = "total_cost", col.scale = tm_scale_continuous(
    n = 10,
    limits = c(min(cost_all_osm$total_cost),max(cost_all_osm$total_cost)),
    values = "rainbow_bgyr_35_85_c73"
  ), lwd = 4)+
  tm_legend(title = "cost (£)", height = 60, frame = FALSE)+
  tm_title("cost of collisions by osm road link. Winsley: 2010 and 2024")


── tmap v3 code detected ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────
[v3->v4] `tm_legend()`: use 'tm_legend()' inside a layer function, e.g.
'tm_polygons(..., fill.legend = tm_legend())'






#tmap_save(tm3, filename = "docs/cost_osm_links.html", selfcontained = TRUE)

title: About
text: These pages publish results of an analysis of the DfT Stats19 data for the Parish of Winsley, Wiltshire.
